text: loid leukemia (AML), treatment will be the same as treatment for newly diagnosed AML.   Treatment of therapy-related MDS is usually the same as for newly diagnosed AML, followed by stem cell transplant.   Transient myeloproliferative disorder (TMD), a type of MDS, usually goes away on its own. For TMD that does not go away on its own, treatment may include the following:         -  Transfusion therapy.    -  Leukapheresis.    -  Chemotherapy.
